# [Interview #1048: WOR Signing Report - IronCaf, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1048#1)

#### IronCaf

The signing tonight was tons of fun, and I was super pumped to meet Brandon Sanderson! I also figured, why not share the tiny nugget he shared with me instead of hoarding it and sitting on it for all eternity, so I made an account and here I am.
